website_summaries.verdict: A good option if you prefer a lighter down comforter for year-round use. Otherwise, choose our best of the best pick.
pros: Features a genuine Egyptian cotton cover and European down in a plush yet lightweight design
cons: Has less fill and thread count than the Egyptian Bedding down duvet, but there isn't much difference in the price

customer_reviews.title: I would give this 10 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a big bedding person, I love soft, heavy and comfy bedding. I live in Florida now so even though down is my favorite thing in the world, it isn’t necessarily ideal for Florida. I read all the reviews for this comforter prior to buying it and I’m pleasantly surprised that all of them are accurate, this comforter is PERFECT!!! It has all the comfort and feel of a down comforter but it’s light enough to use in the warm climate of Florida! I absolutely love this comforter!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Michelsen

customer_reviews.title: Best duvet filler I’ve had
customer_reviews.text: Definitely buy!! This king duvet filler is so soft and breathable! It’s not too hot or cold and fits perfectly on the king size bed. I’ve attahed a video showing the duvet and also a picture of the packaging so you can see the good quality of it. I can’t express enough how affordable and great this duvet is! Definitely a must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great down comforter
customer_reviews.text: I don't write many product reviews but this product is so good I thought I'd let others know. A great weight, great favric and astonishing price. The Cal/King is just the right size for our king size bed. We like to sleep with the temp around 65-69 and this is perfect. The quality seems top notch. Very happy with this product and recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: JimNYC

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality down filled comforter. It is white with baffles so the down doesn't shift around. It is very nice and I just love it. I am loathe to get out of bed now, thank you very much. I'd say it's about the right weight for any season - I have an air-conditioned bedroom. It's not heavy on the feet and legs if you know what I mean. It's white so I put it inside a duvet cover. As far as the sound other reviewers spoke of, I guess. It doesn't bother me and I don't hear the ruffling sound really. It might be because I have it in a cover? I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: yan

customer_reviews.title: Sheds!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this down comforter for three months now, and it sheds so much! Every morning, I find dust and feathers all over my bedroom floor and in my hair. When I opened my duvet cover, I found down and cotton balls shedding from the comforter. It is extremely unhealthy to have an insert that sheds this much - I have been coughing from all the dust accumulating in my room. It is more worth to invest in better duvets.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Park

customer_reviews.title: Must read
customer_reviews.text: I loved how soft it was.. i ordered two one for me and a friend. My friend washed it on a gentle cycle and come to find out all these hairs were inside the washer and it was not feathers that is inside the comforter it is filled with something else. Next time I'll be buying something made in America and not made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gear

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have returned...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get a new comforter, so I put it in my duvet immediately. Fast forward a month. This thing is loud. It makes a weird crinkly sound any time you move it. It isn't soft (which I suppose doesn't matter when it's inside a duvet), but one of the most annoying things is that it doesn't actually fill a queen duvet. So although it has ties, it shifts all over because it doesn't properly fit. So I end up having to adjust it daily. And there's always extra fabric just hanging over the bed. After using if for a month, I'm ready to throw it in the trash. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: jam2016

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising - SIZE IS NOT AS STATED!
customer_reviews.text: Product description states that the King is oversized and measures 104" x 98." I was very disappointed to find that mine measures 97" x 97" and barely makes it over the edge of my King size bed. This was unfortunately a waste of time and money :(
customer_reviews.author: Raina

customer_reviews.title: "UPDATE"
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this comforter about 2 months ago so I'm doing a 2 month "update" it had good quality material but not good enough to keep it from shedding! It wasn't very soft and ended up shedding so bad that I had to put it in a plastic bag and throw it in my closet. The down feathers were just everywhere, and when I say everywhere? I do mean everywhere!! It was very comfortable, it was nice and warm, mind you.. not hot, as I'm a hot sleeper. But just warm and cozy. The shedding became so bad though that I couldn't take it anymore, it had to go in the closet 😢
customer_reviews.author: Snoopy

customer_reviews.title: Good duvet if you sleep hot
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a feather duvet, but tend to sleep hot, so I was glad to see this lightweight option. It's heavy enough for comfort, and is certainly warm, but not as hot as most duvets. It had some feather odor at first, but that seems to have faded away. I don't notice any rustling or noise. I'm very pleased with this purchase, and recommend it for those who sleep hot or live in warm climates, but still want a feather duvet.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ullman

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was more lightweight, but love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this duvet, but the description says light weight. I did not find that to be the case. We used it in late winter, early spring and had to run the a.c. and we were still too sweaty, so we had to remove. I gave it three stars because quality of the product is great, just a little too heavy. I'm hoping this winter will be really cold.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer hummer

customer_reviews.title: A life changing comforting cloud
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but this is in the top 5 material things in my life. This is perfect for two main reasons- 1. Lightweight - I had another down comforter previously with a higher fill count. I didn’t realize how heavy it was on my body until I reviewed this one. This feels like a comforting cloud on my body. 2. Perfect temperature. So far my room has ranged in temperatures between high 50s and low 70s, and I’m always the perfect temperature. With my previous down blanket, I would often wake up sweating.
customer_reviews.author: Brigette Edler

customer_reviews.title: Super Happy
customer_reviews.text: Although this is a lightweight comforter it is by no means flimsy or low quality. The stitching is first rate and strong. You can immediately feel that this comforter will last years and years. Breathable, but it keeps you warm throughout without fear of overheating. Easy to clean and dries fast. Gets fluffier after wash, but not overly so. Looks beautiful on its own as a or insert into duvet. Helpful loops will keep it in place. I don’t have one bad thing to say about my purchase, so I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MsMGR

customer_reviews.title: holy crap!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the most luxurious and plush duvet i have felt in years. It is worth every penny. i go to bed feeling like im sleeping with a cloud. It is a great all season blanket. I bought 2 down comforters at the same time.. 2 of the top rated ones, because i have a king sized guest bed to cover as well. i decided i was going to use the better of the two on my own bed... well this one was the absolute winner!
customer_reviews.author: melissa boyle

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and keep me warm
customer_reviews.text: The conforter is very light, this is what I wanted. It did keep me warm under air condition. Size fitted perfectly as a King with my cover. The only thing I would recommend to always put a cover bc this kind of comforter is hard too clean especially for surface too. It usually doesn’t recommend for you to put it in the washer. Overall I would recommend this for the price and quality. So comforter go over 200 but I guess those are top of the line quality. For 100 for King I would give thing this is a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: TMC HOLDING INC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I run very hot at night and have to keep my a/s running on 70. Standard duvets makes me sweat - I stayed at a Westin and fell in love with their lightweight down... so I went looking for a less expensive alternative - this does not disappoint. Very nice quality and about half the weight of a standard. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shara ChesTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Loud & Crackly Comforter...Really?!
customer_reviews.text: The comforter is thin and light as advertised but I'm so disappointed that it crackles loudly. It's like sleeping with tissue paper. Not the relaxing cloud-like comforter I was hoping for. $100 wasted :(
customer_reviews.author: ripleycar

customer_reviews.title: it was very comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: The comforter seemed very thin and I was concerned that it would not be enough for these cold winter nights, however, it was very comfortable and warm. It remains to be seen if it is useful in the summer months. It feels crisp and "crunchy". I love that feel but some might not like the noise it makes. I liked it enough that I ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: soody

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter
customer_reviews.text: I was worried with this comforter being lightweight that it wouldn’t be warm enough or exactly what I wanted, but it’s perfect. It keeps me warmer than I ever thought it would. The only thing I don’t like is that there are some feathers, but I have a cover on my comforter so it doesn’t really bother me all that much.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable at all
customer_reviews.text: This comforter was very noisy. I ended up sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Avelyn

customer_reviews.title: Stiff, crinkly outside cover.
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is not soft -- the outside fabric is stiff and makes a crinkling noise, and the down fluff inside feels very thin and compacted, even after letting the comforter fluff out for several days. The weight seems summer appropriate, but sadly the quality is just not what I'm looking for. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Angela P. Pan

customer_reviews.title: Like the feel and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a very neat and organized packaging. Not one of the thick and very fluffy comfortor but reaally comfortable and soft in feel. I am not looking for enything very think and hence went for this one. However the quality is very good. True to size. I have also ordered a cover which would protect the comfortor. It feels very cozy and lazy when inside it.
customer_reviews.author: Keshav

customer_reviews.title: Great quality !
customer_reviews.text: The weather is getting colder and colder , so I decide to buy a comfortable and warm down Comforter. I compare several items , finally , I choose this king size down Comforter. It seems I did a good decision. The down comforter is warm and lightweight . It's shell is 100% cotton and inside is white down. I think it is warm enough for me to go through the winter.I am satisfied with it. Great quality !
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We had our garage converted into a guest house and had to purchase beddings for our guests. My sister purchased their seasonal down comforter and recommend this company, but I wanted a king size comforter and it comes only as regular down comforter. Our guest loves it, of course what's not to love, we purchased new bed sheets, new comforter, new pillows, they were in heaven. The comforter isn't heavy at all, it's very comfortable, can't wait for the winter to come and we get to use it more often.
customer_reviews.author: meimei

customer_reviews.title: Loud and like paper
customer_reviews.text: The comforter was really loud and stiff. It was almost like paper. I am returning
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Good in a warmer climate!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. Well packaged. No feathers coming out like some other reviews said. I live in the Deep South but coming from the north I really missed my down comforters!! Very pleased with this so far. Did have to add another blanket when our temp dropped to 54F in the house. No bad smell and seems good quality.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Good except feathers everywhere 😕 Will return and try again, hopefully the 2nd time is the charm.
customer_reviews.text: We were super excited for this purchase to arrive. When the comforter came in, I noticed a few feathers in the packaging but figured that may have just been in the packaging. After putting the comforter on the bed, I noticed more and more feathers all over the bed. Returning this one. We are going to try this product again hoping that this was one particular comforter just defective. If the next one does the same, we will not use this product again... we will see. Fingers crossed. The good thing is that it was soft, warm and comfortable. The only downside was the feather shedding.
customer_reviews.author: EzKen

customer_reviews.title: To crunch and thin!
customer_reviews.text: Very crunchy and not soft at all. You wouldn’t be able to use it without a soft duvet. Really really thin. It’s loud and too crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: muna mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Lighter weight than others I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these as "bedspreads" on my queen-size household beds (I've bought the king-sized ones.) They are very reasonably priced and seem comfortable in fall temperatures by themselves and in winter temperatures with a cotton blanket underneath. I have purchased/returned a several others that cost a lot more and were not as "light" as they advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Reader

customer_reviews.title: It’s a dingy white color and sizing is off! :(
customer_reviews.text: So I gave it a 1 star for two reasons...I ordered a king size, however, it doesn’t even fit on my king size mattress. Super short on the sides! Also, it’s supposed to be white, but it’s totally a dingy yellow. It looks ridiculous against my white sheets and pillowcases. If you want a bright white comforter do not buy this. If you have a king size mattress I suggest you purchase a California king size if that’s an option. I gave it a five star for lightweight, comfort and softness, but I am so upset because I’ve washed it and therefore I’m not able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lightweight comforter!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect weight for spring/summer! Light and airy. It does make a crinkle sound but as you use it that goes away. I also use this with a duvet cover. Very high quality for the price. Super fast shipping. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical odor.
customer_reviews.text: Stong chemical odor when I first opened it. I tumble dried it with some fabric softner sheets hoping to get rid of the smell, but it did not. I'm surprised that not many reviewers mentioned about the chemical smell. I think I would have liked it if it wasn't the smell. I am concerned that the chemical smell will affect my respiratory system. I will wait for few more hours to see if the smell goes away. If not, I will be returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent down comforter!
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with my purchase! That is the best comforter that I've owned! This comforter is exactly what I was looking for. I wanted a medium weight, soft textured, real down comforter. The quality is excellent and the feel of the comforter is soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Max Hu

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: My wife picked this All Season comforter for my son for his twin size bed. We are trying to get it ready for Winter .We lived by the Shore.It is cold and windy in Winter. This comforter is great for him. He rolled on it after I puted on twin size duvet cover. Fits great. To be honestly . I got few comforters(for my bed and guess room)online lately . This is the best one so far . Great buy
customer_reviews.author: SEAN

customer_reviews.title: This item met my expectations. It is sufficiently warm ...
customer_reviews.text: This item met my expectations. It is sufficiently warm for upper Midwest winter nights, soft and has had no shedding. I would reorder it.
customer_reviews.author: j.m.v.

customer_reviews.title: Great Comforter
customer_reviews.text: I like everything abou this comforter. It is made well and is exactly what I wanted for summer months.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, but could've been cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Duvet is a nice weight and the down seems to stay evenly distributed. However, I've had the duvet for ~3 months now and it's shedding like crazy. There's constantly feathers everywhere. I'd look to purchase a similar duvet from TJ Maxx in the $80-$90 price range before I'd drop another $120 on this one.
customer_reviews.author: kcomalley

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality for good price. No feathers escaping. No crinkly noise like some others complained of for other brands. Bought a second one for the guest room. The light weight one is lighter than the all season duvet which is a bit warm for the south.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta A.

customer_reviews.title: The incredible shrinking duvet
customer_reviews.text: We bought this duvet a few months ago, and at first it fit nicely into our queen sized duvet cover. But gradually over the weeks the duvet has obviously compacted in on itself and shrunk considerably. The duvet is now much too small for the duvet cover, creating all of this extra fabric around the top that annoys us immensely. If my return window hadn't passed while I was distracted by other things, I would return it now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida so this light weight comforter is perfect for me! It’s warm enough and at the same time super lightweight! The quality is great it’s very well made. Quality items like this can last for a long time! I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Iriskaamerica

customer_reviews.title: I love this comforter best price I ever spent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after reading reviews and knew that it would be a lightweight comforter. I live in New York .on summer time and the evenings here are almost always one-layered kind of nights (since using AC costs an arm and your firstborn). I'm really happy with this purchase; I had bought a different comforter about a month before but the quality of that one was inferior to this and it tore. I'm glad I replaced it with this—it's soft, comfy, and not heavy .
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: lightweight hot weather perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect weight comforter. It is not too heavy and regulates body temperature perfectly for summer and warm climates. I use it in South Florida in summer months and its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Michele F.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but different :)
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I would recommend and It’s very nice for hot sleepers like myself. Everything was perfect with the product, aside from the fact that i thought it would be more like the photo and it doesn’t look the same fabric but still was very nice and it didn’t bother me because mine is covered by a duvet.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Taxdahl

customer_reviews.title: Not large enough for king bed
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t fit my king bed. It hardly hangs over the edge on each side so my sheets hang way past it. Also it’s loud and crinkly sounding when you move around in it at night. It is lightweight though but still too hot for summer in the south east region of the US.
customer_reviews.author: JPK_817

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping Bag Material
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this comforter at all. It is not comfortable, it's too lightweight and has a sleeping bag feel to it. The noise is so loud and distracting when you move. I do not recommend this comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: I like this blanket although I would not consider this a summer time blanket, it is very warm. I've seen people complain about the sound which not bad actually the sound of a high quality down comforter and its not flat at all pretty fluffy and comfortable. one thing is that I find feather around my room.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C Flores

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful
customer_reviews.text: The duvet smelled horrible when it arrived I aired this out for 3 days and then put it in my cover. 3 weeks later it still smells!!! Also- it’s not as light as I expected- it’s quite warm
customer_reviews.author: Susan P.

customer_reviews.title: Feathers leak out but soft and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Pros: lightweight and warm enough for Southern California. Cons: feathers leak out of it If you put another permanent cover (need a very tight weave) over it then it may help with the leaking feathers. We use it in a duvet cover but when we wash the duvet cover, there’s a lot of feathers inside of it.
customer_reviews.author: MomInOC

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a lot of junky comforters on amazon, this one was a surprising delight... down stays in blanket, it’s light but warm- even for winter, and it’s confortable
customer_reviews.author: Raggity Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great for hot sleepers
customer_reviews.text: Great duvet for hot sleepers. I usually get too warm, living in the south, but this doesn’t make me overheat. Keeps me warm on the cooler nights!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Eggers

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product! It is lightweight and I live in AZ desert....the down does not shift and it was priced reasonably. Have not found anything that I don't like about it.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful comforter. Soft, warm and is a very nice size. Most down comforters hang too short on the sides of the bed and don't cover enough when two people are actually under them. When one person roles over, the comforter gets pulled off the other person. This comforter hangs nicely and long over the sides of the bed. Great price for a great comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. King

customer_reviews.title: Get your Pledge out
customer_reviews.text: This has a great weight and temp -we live in the south. Fits the Pottery Barn twin duvet nicely. But! There is ALWAYS small down on the dresser next to the bed and the wood floor. I bet my son is breathing it in his lungs at night as well. Would not buy another
customer_reviews.author: LCK

customer_reviews.title: Paper thin!
customer_reviews.text: This duvet is PAPER THIN! If you hold it up it up to the light you can see a teeny tiny bit of down and feathers inside it, barely any, not even enough to fill the baffle box. It was a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Comforter is hot and sheds lint everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is extremely hot and uncomfortable. Also, it sheds lint everywhere. Very disappointed with it. The positive reviews are very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: West44

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer down
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect summer down. Thin enough for summer but some weight to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Pedraza

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight. Not without some crunching to the fabric but under the duvet it's very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like a perfect cloud
customer_reviews.text: Such a wonderful surprise....we do our research, read review and then we hope we selected the product that we wanted/needed....In love with this temperature perfect lightweight soft cloud. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Carla Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Great value !!!
customer_reviews.text: This duvet is everything I hoped it would be. I did a lot of research before choosing one, you can’t choose a cheap duvet and expect quality so I ended up with this one and I love it! This is perfect lightweight and super soft warm comforter . Highly recommend !!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Light,odor free
customer_reviews.text: I will definitely give 6 stars if I could, the reason why I put this just because my wife, we have our second baby on the way, preparing all the things for our new family number, this product is soft,odor free,and very light. Really good experience
customer_reviews.author: QIUQI

customer_reviews.title: Stinky but comfy
customer_reviews.text: I really like the overall quality of the comforter. BUT it smelled like goats when I got it. I can still smell it faintly when I walk in my room. But it’s getting better.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Came with yellow stain.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and it came with a yellow stain on it...makes me think this product is used. I’m not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Happy Sleeper
customer_reviews.text: This is about right for summer, although maybe still a little warm for where I live. I wake up in the middle of the night and have to kick it off. The quality seems good, very lightweight and clean. The usual down crunchy sound, which I enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: LeeLee

customer_reviews.title: Very good summer comforter
customer_reviews.text: I like the lightweight of this comforter. It’s perfect for summer. It is a little noisy but I’ve gotten use to it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Great for hot sleepers
customer_reviews.text: i am a hot sleeper and got this based on the reviews! I’m so glad i did. My husband and i have not been able to share covers for years and now we can:)
customer_reviews.author: joy amos

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I like this comforter very much I do wish it made a little less noise as it crinkles but I suspect that that will soften up as I have it a while
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these, one for each elderly parent. One likes to be warmer, the other cooler. This one all-seasons design worked out well for each of them. Grateful for the affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: ConsumerNYC

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing! - They are so soft yet hold shape
customer_reviews.text: Simply Amazing! - They are so soft yet hold shape.I am picky when it comes to anything having to do with sleep.I only like down pillows and these meet my fluffiness.I put in the dryer on air for 15 minutes as suggested in another review and it fluffed up nicely.So far they have kept their shape.I wouldn't normally buy pillows without first seeing, but I'm glad I took the chance based on others reviews.Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: lily lu

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product.
customer_reviews.text: does not fluff up by shaking or drying it. it's pretty flat. it's not very warm so that is a good thing for me as I tend to sweat when I sleep.
customer_reviews.author: George Moore

customer_reviews.title: Soft but sleeps warm!
customer_reviews.text: This is way too warm. Not sure why it's called light weight. But it's well made. No smell. Highly recommend on the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Miller

customer_reviews.title: unbelievable blanket
customer_reviews.text: This comforter will satisfy even the pickiest of sleepers. It is PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.author: vida

customer_reviews.title: So soft and well made.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is soft, soft and well made. Washes beautifully. Texture and feel are lovely to sleep under. Shams were quite a surprise as they are the same soft feel and excellent envelope enclosure. Bought another.
customer_reviews.author: taswell

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Great duvet, good quality, warm, and easy to add a duvet cover (includes corner ties). I paired this with a custom duvet cover from Redbubble ("The God Source" by Salviadroid). Looks ABSOLUTELY FANTASTIC and very warm! Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: yoyo

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to sweep feathers
customer_reviews.text: It’s an okay comforter but I’m sweeping up feather daily....
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Reasonable price. A bit heavier than advertised...not quite as "light" as they say.
customer_reviews.author: First Lewie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought a king size duvet that fits perfectly,Duvets are very lightweight and of good quality very soft and comfortable and also very warm,My girlfriend and I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Hole in blanket
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this comforter three stars because when I received it, it had a hole which made a mess with the feathers. Thankfully I was able to see the hole shut but I am very disappointed due to the price. Other then that, the comforter is nice. Just very disappointed with the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Purchase This!
customer_reviews.text: This duvet is warm and very well made. Shipping was prompt with it packaged well. This is a duvet you don't need a cover for because it looks wonderful and feels great. I willl be purchasing one for each of my 3 guest rooms. Don't hesitate in purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm enough
customer_reviews.text: First time bought comforter online, and it does not make me disappointed. It came in a heavy storage box outside, and inside with a durable bag. The one I bought is extra warm, it is heavy, but not too over. I do not feel stressful as it covers over me. It is warm and soft. I like it in one word.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Winter Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very nice down duvet. Will be huge comfort in winter time.
customer_reviews.author: Betrica Louis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, true light-mid weight
customer_reviews.text: Outer fabric a little crinkly/noisy but not too bad. Good for Wisconsin summer when it is cool. would call it mid-light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: When Down is Up!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect weight for what I wanted! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Palmer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, bought it for my grand daughter at the ...
customer_reviews.text: beautiful , bought it for my grand daughter at the University.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for me!
customer_reviews.text: I really like that it’s so lightweight. I can’t sleep under a heavy blanket. On the other hand I would have liked a little more down I the filler, because it flattens so easily.
customer_reviews.author: frances d ferrara

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, fluffy and comfy
customer_reviews.text: This down comforter came in a very handy box which I will keep it for storage again after winter. It's lightweight, fluffy and comfy that meets your expectation over a down comforter. The down filling is still evenly distributed after one night of sleep. And very importantly its odor Free. It works well to keep you warm without sweating. Overall, it's a great product for winter.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Nice but too warm
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely goose down comforter insert, but it is too warm for the climate in Pleasanton CA, even in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noisy comforter
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to love this comforter but it has a loud, crunchy- like noise that kept us up several nights so we have to return. Other than that, the weight is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: CACO

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: this duvet is SO nice! With mixed reviews, I wasn’t sure what to expect. I’ve had really great down duvets and also spent years using cheap target comforters. The quality of this one is right up there with the best of them. Highly recommend. Super comfortable and super soft!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy chen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent comforter and great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic comforter, especially for the price. I’d put this up against $300-$400 comforters. Super comfortable and lightweight but still warm and not thin like other light comforters.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in Quality & Price!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect summer down comforter. I like to sleep with a light cover and this fits the bill. Cool, comfortable, soft. No sweating noted as the material allows for “breathing” or air movement.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: good comforter
customer_reviews.text: first got this comforter feel not fluffy enoght and i put it on dryer machine after 15 minite feel so fluffy. lightweight soft and comforterble .Bought extra warm but not as thick as I thought.otherwise that would be perfect
customer_reviews.author: wendycao

customer_reviews.title: Love this blanket!
customer_reviews.text: Soft, warm and lightweight! I don't understand the reviews saying it's "crunchy" at all. I'm pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: tw

customer_reviews.title: Covering yourself with a cloud!
customer_reviews.text: It really is like covering yourself with a cloud! Lightweight comfortable and warm!
customer_reviews.author: Louis Cote

customer_reviews.title: leaking down
customer_reviews.text: I want very much to love this comforter but it has been leaking down since the 2nd week we've had it. I foolishly thought it would eventually cease or that there was a small holes that could easily be mended but neither were the case. It's just a faulty product :(
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Carey

customer_reviews.title: Best comforter
customer_reviews.text: Love my new comforter , is good quality- very light specially in the summer time - is fluffy soft and very cozy -
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and a Great Value
customer_reviews.text: The comforter is well made and just the right warmth. This is a good buy! I also wanted to note that it came quickly with a good follow up from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: GCO

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Feathers come out forever
customer_reviews.text: It has been more than 5 months , and the feathers still fly around like it is snowing.
customer_reviews.author: K. K.

customer_reviews.title: wanted it to be great
customer_reviews.text: it is too small to fit correctly in my king duvet cover and it is very hot!
customer_reviews.author: beverly erben

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable but I’ve had it for about a month and the stitching is already coming undone...with this price I didn’t think that would happen. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice contorter still a little warm for me but I'm a hot sleeper. It crinkles a little but u get used to it really no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Hall

product_meta.title: downluxe Lightweight White Down Comforter Queen Size - Down Duvet Inserts,230 Thread Count 550+ Fill Power,100% Cotton Shell Down Proof with Tabs
feature_bullets: ❤ 100% Down Proof Cotton Cover with Tabs, creates a softer feel and more pleasing sleep experience throughout the night!

❤ Remarkable Crafting & Design–The End to end box and double-needle stitching style that not only looks elegant but secure the filling in place, with zero concern of filling leakage or loose thread. So you always have a plush, fluffy comforter that retains its shape.
❤ Lightweight - 550+ Fill power, filled with sufficient down and feather. Lightweight warmth Summer Or 'Hot Sleepers'
❤ Queen Down Comforter duvet insert measures- 88x88 inches.
❤ Brand new and factory sealed in a beautiful zippered package for easy storing and packing.
